page.title: 03FAMILIES AND LEISURE
page.content: I am one of a{family}of five and I live in a three-bedroomed house.My dad is a policeman and his hobbies are dog-training,snooker,cycling and country walks.Our{home life}revolves round mam,a{housewife.}She does not go to work,but does lots of jobs in the house,such as cooking,cleaning, washing,ironing etc. My mam likes gardening,reading,country walks and does lots of knitting. My oldest brother is called Darren who is fourteen years old. Darren's hobbies are snooker,cycling, he also likes bird watching and is a member of Y.O.C.He is also very good at playing the Northumbrian pipes and the mouth organ.My other brother is called Gavin and he is eleven years old. Gavin's hobbies are snooker and listening to Elvis Presley records.He too likes going on{country walks}and is a member
